name: Soluna Torch
description:
The game is set in distant future where the atmosphere has been highly contaminated and entirely covered with debris from crashed satellites and trash from humans over the years. This contamination is depriving earth from any kind of natural light, i.e. Sunlight.

 To solve this, one guy named George has came up with a torch, which emits UV rays in such a way that it simulates sunlight. The torch can also change the intensity of the light it emits. The torch can bloom plants like natural sunlight would, and also melt things on high intensities.

CONTROLS-

WASD to move. Space to Jump

Left click to keep the sunlight on.

Scroll/1-2-3-4 to change torch's intensity.
